div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1239 Prinkipo (now Büjük Ada; anc. (841) Pityusa), Bithynia, 1930 Burial: 335-334 B.C. Contents: 200+ EL, 47+ AV. With gold ring Philip II: 27+ AV st. Panticapaeum: 16+ AV st. Cyzicus: 200+ EL St. Lampsacus: 4+ AV st. Disposition: Istanbul 207; Jameson 2 (Cat. 2570, 2574) Regling, ZfN 1931, pp. 1-46, illus. The lot in Istanbul comprises 160 Cyzicene staters, but apparently at least 40 appeared in trade
